document_name: Decree-Law no. 11/2011 creating the National Institute of Meteorology
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/GNB/2011/GNB-2011-09-08-Decree-Law no. 11_2011 creating the National Institute of Meteorology_66c71722cdfc9088d1ed06c4ee2e7c3b.pdf
document_description: This Decree-Law creates the National Institute of Meteorology of Guinea-Bissau (INM-GB). The Institute is a public institute under governmental supervision. The document further establishes the institute's missions, including assessing climate, its variability, its effects, and contributing to develop adaptation recommendations.
